ygData.subject: RE: Rarity of lambent stones
ygData.msgSnippet: Reguarding the Lambent stones, we killed about 16 hg s in mountains zone and did not get any stones at all.  We were 2 bards and a druid.    Then last night i
ygData.messageBody:
Reguarding the Lambent stones, we killed about 16 hg's in mountains zone and
did not get any stones at all. We were 2 bards and a druid. Then last
night i bought a lambent stone for 70pp from a guy who then proceeded to ask
me tons of questions about my bard quests and my icy greaves...

On another note, a paladin on my server had a lambent stone the other night
and cashed it in for a staff of solusek ro which he then traded in for a
staff of writhing.... So i'd say the 70pp i paid for my stone was no loss.

I've gotta go see if genni is fixed or not on sol ro, i have what i need for
the pants, and my buddy got his breastplate last night, lucky sob

Minkin
Sol Ro
level 35 forever

> -----Original Message-----
> From: John Robertson [SMTP:johnr@...]
> Sent: Monday, October 18, 1999 4:01 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Rarity of lambent stones
>
> From: John Robertson <johnr@...>
>
>
> I found a lambent stone on the first giant I killed, then had a
> mini-drought. I would say from
> my experience, which is four lambent stones worth, that about one in four
> giants in Rathe
> Mountains seems to drop a stone. This seems to be higher than the
> reported incidence from other
> bards though.
>
> Jyzan
>
>
> "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" wrote:
>
> > From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>
> >
> > I'm finding it easier to get the armor quest components versus getting a
> > lambent stones. So far I have five quest components. I have been
> > auctioning to buy a lambent stone ever since the patch came out. I have
> > tried this in every zone I pass through. Not once has anyone had one to
> > sell. I've asked my guild to be on the lookout for them. Despite
> killing
> > numerous giants, no one in my guild has looted one. Do lambent stones
> only
> > get dropped in specific zones or can they get dropped in any zone with a
> > giant or griffin? How often do they get dropped?
> >
> > Also, can non-bards complete the bard armor quests in order to sell the
> > lambent armor pieces? If the armor is NO DROP, I guess its possible
> that
> > people are hanging on to lambent stones so they can complete the quests.
> I
> > know most of the quest components are NO DROP but I can't remember if
> the
> > lambent armor is NO DROP so can someone confirm this for me?
> >
> > Thanks
> > Galtin of E'ci
> >
> > > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to
> toren@... with the subject lol.
>
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@...
> with the subject lol.
